documentIdFormat.description: The format of the document id.

documentCode.description: The code for the document type.

annotationObject.description: Additional annotation information for the document.

blobStorageId.description: The blob storage id for the document.

attestationId.description: The attestation for the document if one was created.

dateCreated.description: The date/time of when the element was created.

dateModified.description: The date/time of when the element was modified.

dateDeleted.description: The date/time of when the element was deleted, as we never actually remove items.
